{{flavour|A magical device which throws exploding blasts of flame.}}

Evoking a '''wand of fireball''' has the same effect as casting the spell [[Fireball]], blasting a tile and everything adjacent to it for moderate EV-bypassing [[fire]] damage. It has perfect accuracy, but creates a lot of [[noise]] and can injure you if you fire it at a tile adjacent to you. Its [[spell power]] is based upon your [[Evocations]] skill.

It can hold at most 15 charges.

==Tips & Tricks==
Characters without access to [[Fire Magic]] can use wands of fireball to burn down trees.

==History==
Wands of fireball were removed in [[0.18]].

Prior to [[0.17]], it could hold at most 9 charges.
